name: Medusa's Heart of Stone Chapter 01
description:
Medusa was transformed into a gorgon for defiling Athena's temple while serving as a priestess there. Condemned to spend the rest of her life on a distant isle, she is determined to find a soulmate even though most of her visitors wish to chop off her head! Follow Medusa as she embarks on a journey to prove that even a gorgon can be loved.

Play through a storyline that is both deep and lighthearted.

Your actions will determine your fate.

Defy mortals and the gods!



  • Use your gorgon powers to turn things into stone.
  • Go on quests.
  • Meet the gods and other strange and interesting characters from greek mythology.
  • Talk to your hair.

NOTE: Originally, we planned to make this game three chapters long. Due to changing circumstances, we have decided to release the first chapter as a stand alone game. We hope you enjoy what we were able to finish.
